member.name: P:ExamSchedulerX_By_W4L33Dx.WaterFX.Scale
member.summary:
The scale of the wave matrix compared to the size of the image. Use it for large images to reduce processor load.
0 : wave resolution is the same than image resolution 1 : wave resolution is half the image resolution ...and so on
